channel.title: CVE Feed for The Eclipse Foundation -- Eclipse Californium
channel.description: The latest CVEs for The Eclipse Foundation -- Eclipse Californium

item.title: CVE-2021-34433|2024-08-04T00:12:50.235Z -- the%20eclipse%20foundation -- eclipse%20californium
item.description: In Eclipse Californium version 2.0.0 to 2.6.4 and 3.0.0-M1 to 3.0.0-M3, the certificate based (x509 and RPK) DTLS handshakes accidentally succeeds without verifying the server side's signature on the client side, if that signature is not included in the server's ServerKeyExchange.
